\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&, row sep = small]
	\&\& {c_2} \& {c_3} \\
	{\,} \& X \& F \& {F/X} \& {r_1} \\
	\& X \& E \& {(F/X)^C} \& {r_2} \\
	\&\& {(F/X)^F} \& {(F/X)^F}
	\arrow[from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow[equals, from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow[from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow[dashed, from=3-2, to=3-3]
	\arrow[dashed, from=3-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow[dashed, from=3-3, to=3-4]
	\arrow[from=3-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow[dashed, from=4-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow[from=4-4, to=3-4]
	\arrow[equals, from=4-4, to=4-3]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
